code: import axios from'axios';import{BASE_URL}from'../constants/urls';import{goToAdmin,goToIndex}from'../routes/coordinator';export var login=function login(body,clear,navigate){var url="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/users/login");var headers={'Content-Type':'application/json'};axios.post(url,body,headers).then(function(response){console.log(response);localStorage.setItem("token",response.data.token);goToIndex(navigate);clear();}).catch(function(error){if(error.response.data.message===undefined){alert(error.response.data);console.log(error.response.data);}else{alert(error.response.data.message);console.log(error.response.data.message);}});};export var signup=function signup(body,clear,navigate){var url="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/users/signup");var headers={'Content-Type':'application/json'};axios.post(url,body,headers).then(function(response){localStorage.setItem("token",response.data.token);goToIndex(navigate);clear();}).catch(function(error){if(error.response.data.message===undefined){alert(error.response.data);console.log(error.response.data);}else{alert(error.response.data.message);console.log(error.response.data.message);}});};export var deletePizza=function deletePizza(id,request){var url="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/pizzas/").concat(id);axios.delete(url).then(function(res){console.log(res);request();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};export var addPizza=function addPizza(body,clear,navigate){var url="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/pizzas");var headers={'Content-Type':'application/json'};axios.post(url,body,headers).then(function(response){goToAdmin(navigate);clear();}).catch(function(error){if(error.response.data.message===undefined){alert(error.response.data);console.log(error.response.data);}else{alert(error.response.data.message);console.log(error.response.data.message);}});};
